Instruction: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees Fahrenheit (175 degrees Celsius).

Combine the flour and sugar in a large bowl, then blend in the butter. Add the egg yolks, lemon juice, and milk gradually. In a separate bowl, whip the egg whites until stiff peaks form. Gently fold the egg whites into the lemon mixture. Pour the mixture into a casserole dish.
Bake for 35 minutes in the oven at the preheated temperature. Serve either warm or chilled.
